List<JBCXM__PickList__c> milestonelist = new List<JBCXM__PickList__c>();

JBCXM__PickList__c dummy = null;

for(integer i=0 ; i<2 ; i++ )
{
    dummy = new JBCXM__PickList__c (  Name = 'milestone'+i ,
									  JBCXM__DisplayOrder__c = +i ,
									  JBCXM__SystemName__c = 'sys'+i ,
									  JBCXM__Attribute1__c = '#FF0000' ,
									  JBCXM__Active__c = true ,
									  JBCXM__Category__c = 'Milestones' ) ;
milestonelist.add(dummy);
}
insert milestonelist ;
